info.name: Detect Deprecated XSS Protection Header
author: joshlarsen
info.description: Setting the XSS-Protection header is deprecated by most browsers. Setting the header to anything other than `0` can actually introduce an XSS vulnerability.

request:
GET /actuator/health HTTP/1.1
Host: api.dossierfacile.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:

Connection: close
Transfer-Encoding: chunked
Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate
Content-Security-Policy: frame-ancestors 'none'; frame-src 'none'; child-src 'none'; upgrade-insecure-requests; default-src 'none'; script-src 'self'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; object-src 'none'; img-src 'self' data:; font-src 'self'; connect-src *.dossierfacile.fr; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'none'; media-src 'none'; worker-src 'none'; manifest-src 'none'; prefetch-src 'none';
Content-Type: application/vnd.spring-boot.actuator.v3+json
Date: Sun, 03 Jul 2022 02:16:25 GMT
Expires: 0
Pragma: no-cache
Set-Cookie: sc-sticky-session=tpE7H3IrKGwBDxipqlu9BYAof7ieVwb8P4fzzuxmHhS22rnfhM0uPwnXX3wJpl9fE2LBM2V9DWh/3GVNOMOrEA==; Expires=Mon, 04-Jul-22 02:16:25 GMT; Max-Age=86400; Path=/; Secure; HttpOnly; SameSite=None
Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000
Vary: Origin
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Method
Vary: Access-Control-Request-Headers
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN
X-Request-Id: 5efc74d3-e728-46c2-b3dd-a98a38f6a31c
X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block

{"status":"UP","components":{"custom":{"status":"UP","details":{"Service":"Running","Error":"No Error- Healthy status","error":"java.lang.RuntimeException: null"}},"db":{"status":"UP","details":{"database":"PostgreSQL","validationQuery":"isValid()"}},"ping":{"status":"UP"},"rabbit":{"status":"UP","details":{"version":"3.8.14"}}}}
